course.subject: FINA
course.name: Carbon Management Basics for Financial Institutions
course.description: The world needs to reach net zero emission by 2050 to keep global warming within 1.5 Â°C by the end of this century. Financial sector plays an important role in this net zero transition. This course equips the students with the basic knowledge and practical tools of net zero strategy for financial institutions. It elaborates the concepts on climate change, the measurement tool of greenhouse emissions, the low-carbon roadmap for financial institutions and the development of sustainable finance products related to climate change.
